poolcounter-connection-error:
Used at least in the MediaWiki message {{msg-mw|view-pool-error}}.

Used as fatal error message.

Parameters:
* $1 - error message which is returned by the server
* $2 - the server hostname
poolcounter-read-error:
Used as error message.

Parameters:
* $1 - the server hostname

See also:
* {{msg-mw|Poolcounter-write-error}}
poolcounter-write-error:
Used as error message.

Parameters:
* $1 - the server hostname

See also:
* {{msg-mw|Poolcounter-read-error}}
poolcounter-remote-error:
Used as error message. Parameters:
* $1 - error message which the server returned, or not-localized string "(no message given)".
* $2 - the server hostname
